headline.main: Leading Health Groups Endorse a Meal Plan

docs.abstract: Five of nation's top health organizations jointly endorse healthy eating plan meant to help stave off diseases that kill most people: heart disease, stroke, cancer and diabetes; Unified Dietary Guidelines were just made public by American Cancer Society, American Dietetic Assn, American Academy of Pediatrics, National Institutes of Health and American Heart Assn; advice is to cut fat and cholesterol, and eat plenty of grains, fruits and vegetables (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: Five of the nation's top health organizations have jointly endorsed a healthy eating plan meant to help stave off the diseases that kill most people: heart disease, stroke, cancer and diabetes. The advice is not new: Cut fat and cholesterol, eat plenty of grains, fruits and vegetables.
